entry.title: Why do you have to keep learning?
entry.content:
Â¶â€ƒâ€ƒLife is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving.

Â¶â€ƒâ€ƒVision without execution is just hallucination.

Â¶â€ƒâ€ƒYou learn something every day if you pay attention.

Â¶â€ƒâ€ƒThe past can hurt. But the way I see it, you can either run from it, or learn from it.
